Name: Creation VI
Desc:
Creates Ether Swords with your current Ether. The number of Ether Swords are automatically adjusted based on the level of current Ether.
Ether Swords automatically attack nearby enemies and do not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status. Can be toggled On/Off.
Required Skill: Creation Lv. 10 or higher

HFields.h1:
When Trigger skills hit, attacks up to 10 enemies at 1020% Damage every 1.5 sec.
1 attacks per Ether Sword.
Attacks create a 30% chance of creating an Ether Crystal.
Cooldown: 500 sec.
